mapper.sql: FS_NO, FS_REGIONNO, FS_STARLVL, FS_NAME, FS_ADDR, FS_SPECIALITY, FI_STAT
mapper.select: SELECT a.FS_NO, a.FS_REGIONNO, a.FS_STARLVL, a.FS_NAME, a.FS_ADDR, a.FS_SPECIALITY, a.FI_STAT, a.FC_DESC, b.FS_SCENICNO FROM TACCOMADATION a, TResourceScenic b WHERE a.FS_NO = b.FS_RESNO AND b.FS_RESTYPE = 'bg' AND FS_NO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TACCOMADATION (FS_NO, FS_REGIONNO, FS_STARLVL, FS_NAME, FS_ADDR, FS_SPECIALITY, FI_STAT, FC_DESC) values (#{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starlvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{desc,jdbcType=CLOB})

insert into TACCOMADATION
FS_NO,
FS_REGIONNO,
FS_STARLVL,
FS_NAME,

FS_SPECIALITY,
FI_STAT,
FC_DESC,

mapper.update:
update TACCOMADATION
FS_REGIONNO = #{regionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_STARLVL = #{starlvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_SPECIALITY = #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FI_STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FC_DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=CLOB},
where FS_NO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TACCOMADATION set FS_REGIONNO = #{regionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_STARLVL = #{starlvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_SPECIALITY = #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FI_STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FC_DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=CLOB} where FS_NO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
